clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Teicoplanin and Vancomycin in Initial Empirical Antibiotic Regimen for Febrile Neutropenic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Teicoplanin and Vancomycin in Initial Empirical Antibiotic Regimen for Febrile Neutropenic Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Teicoplanin versus Vancomycin as part of the initial antibiotic regimen in the therapy of patients with fever and neutropenia .

primary_outcome.measure: The primary efficacy parameter will be the Response
primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 to 6 days after study drug discontinuation.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety will be assessed for all randomized patients who received at least one dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month after the last dose of the drug
